Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've KSP on and off for quite some time however I recently started streaming and thought I'd give KSP a go. I hope ya'll don't mind me pasting my stream link here. I just started streaming so tips are appreciated! (Sorry if you don't like it!! D:)

PS: I've never learned a whole lot so there are a lot of disasters lol.

[http://twitch.tv/tektie](http://twitch.tv/tektie)
Streaming right now. Input is well appreciated! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
